Ionic Link Bug

Oct 6, 2015

Currently on the iOS, there is a link bug which occurs between page transitions with Ionic. I don’t know if it occurs when the app is published, but it occurring on the Ionic App thats used for testing.

If the link uses menu-close or nav-clear, occasionally the page swipes backwards and other times, the back button occurs. If it was a consistent problem, a work around or the bug could be fixed, but in this case, it only occurs occasionally.

To solve this, we’ll use ng-click and $location.path() to create the link in the controller. This solves the transition problem and also lets us control the next view animation. This probably isn’t the best solution, but it seems to work well enough for now.
